Posts.Content: nomadus2 wrote: Friday I went to my PvP and they called my General surgeon to suggest cancelling my surgery until my oncology doctor gives the go ahead. I have met with him twice and he knows about my blood disorder. Know after months of waiting for surgery they decide that my blood disorder could be a problem. I need help finding another team who can do this and help me. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: cancelled surgery by medical professionals help nomadus2 BarredOwl
